<< cell Data structures celldisp >>

cell2struct

Creates a struct from a cell.

Syntax

st = cell2struct(ce, fields)
st = cell2struct(ce, fields, dim)

Input argument

ce

a cell.

fields

a cell of strings.

dim

dimension along cell is converted.

Output argument

st

a struct array.

Description

st = cell2struct(ce, fields) creates a struct from a cell.

Example

ce = {85, 50, 68; 'Pierre', 'Anna', 'Roberto'}
fields = {'Height','Name'}
A = cell2struct (ce, fields, 1)

See also

cell, struct, struct2cell.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
